thread.title: One Banking Scandal That Can Be Laid to Rest
thread.title_full: One Banking Scandal That Can Be Laid to Rest - WSJ

author: Paul J Davies
title: One Banking Scandal That Can Be Laid to Rest
text:
Enough is enough. The U.K. consumer watchdog is calling time on a misselling scandal that has long dogged the country’s banks, especially Lloyds Banking Group.
No doubt Payment Protection Insurance (PPI) linked to loans was foisted upon lots of people who didn’t need it and many who could never have made a successful claim. It was a terrible... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
